permissions.title: Permissions

about.title: About Permissions
about.description: Permissions control how much autonomy your agent has. In Explore mode, the agent can only read and research — perfect for understanding a problem before committing to changes. When you're ready, switch to Execute mode to let the agent implement the plan autonomously.
about.workflow: A good workflow: start in Explore to let the agent investigate, review the proposed plan, then execute with confidence.

permissions.defaultPermissionsDescription: App-level patterns allowed in Explore mode. Commands not on this list are blocked.
permissions.workspaceCustomizationsDescription: Additional permissions defined in this workspace's permissions.json file.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Get notified when agent tasks complete

connection.title: API Connection
connection.description: How your AI agents connect to language models.
connection.claudePro: Claude Pro/Max — using your Claude subscription
connection.apiKey: API Key — Anthropic, OpenRouter, or compatible API
connection.customModelDescription: Override all model calls with this model ID (useful for OpenRouter, Ollama, etc.)

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.basicInfoDesc: Help Craft Agent personalize responses to you.
preferences.name: Name
preferences.nameDesc: How Craft Agent should address you.
preferences.timezoneDesc: Used for relative dates like 'tomorrow' or 'next week'.
preferences.languageDesc: Preferred language for Craft Agent's responses.
preferences.locationDesc: Enables location-aware responses like weather, local time, and regional context.
preferences.cityDesc: Your city for local information and context.
preferences.countryDesc: Your country for regional formatting and context.
preferences.notesDesc: Free-form context that helps Craft Agent understand your preferences.
preferences.notesPlaceholder: Any additional context you'd like Craft Agent to know...

shortcuts.description: Quick reference for all available keyboard shortcuts

modeCycling.description: Select which modes to cycle through with Shift+Tab

labels.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this label?
labels.name: Name
labels.autoApplyDesc: Automatically apply this label to new chats

sources.title: Sources
sources.emptyDescription: Sources connect your agent to external data — MCP servers, REST APIs, and local folders.

skills.emptyDescription: Skills are reusable instructions that teach your agent specialized behaviors.
